author: MuMeM
title: Core library for MuMeM packages
description:
This is the core library for MuMeM packages.
It contains various helper functions for other modules to work.

author: MuMeM
title: Logging library for MuMeM packages
description:
The logging library for MuMeM Packages
It contains verious methods dealing with logging and log filtering.

author: MuMeM
title: GMCP library for MuMeM packages
description:
GMCP library for MuMeM packages.
It deals with the GMCP messages.

author: MuMeM
title: Player library for MuMeM packages
description:
This is a library for player vitals and status.
It contains various functions about player vitls and status.

author: MuMeM
title: Room library for MuMeM packages
description:
Package dealing with Room data.
It contains functions for dealing with room data itself,
but also with contents of the room, like mobiles.

author: MuMeM
title: MuMeM Visio, a graphical MUME client
description:
MuMeM-Visio aims to be a graphical MUME client.
It is newbie friendly and allows to play the with point & click.

NOTE: This is still in POC phase!

author: MuMeM
title: MuMeM Package Manager
description: A simple, graphical package manager for MuMeM packages.

author: MuMeM
title: MuMeM Communication
description:
A fast communication window for MUME

With MuMeM communication you can open multiple communication widgets to fine-tune the communication to your likings. It stores the whole communication in a dedicated repository, so having multiple windows open is not a problem.

author: MuMeM
title: A HUD compass for MUME
description: A HUD compass for MUME, showing exits and allows you to interact with theses.

author: MuMeM
title: Various widgets
description:
Various widgets for MuMeM, like
- ListBox
- RadioButtons and Radio Groups
- CheckBoxes
- TextInput
- and more

author: MuMeM
title: A graphical prompt for MUME
description:
A graphical vitals and staus prompt, done the MUME way.

It contains
  * Healthbar
  * Manabar
  * Movebar
  * Various status indicators

author: MuMeM
title: Various calendar function for MuMeM packages
description:
This module contains functions dealing with Calendar stuff.
E.g. time, date, and the like

author: MuMeM
title: Various calendar function for MuMeM packages
description:
This module contains functions dealing with MUME events.
E.g. moved, ...
